dt2.9:4.3: saṅkhārakkhandhena ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi sampayuttā?
dt2.9:4.4: Te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā;
dt2.9:5.6: manoviññāṇadhātuyā ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā … pe …
dt2.9:6.2: maggasaccena ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā …
dt2.9:6.3: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayuttā;
dt2.9:6.4: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.

dt2.9:19.6: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayuttā;

dt2.9:21.3: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā;

dt2.9:23.1: Adhimokkhena ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā …
dt2.9:23.2: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena dvīhi dhātūhi sampayuttā;
dt2.9:23.3: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.9:25.1: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.9:25.2: dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.9:25.3: adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā …
dt2.9:26.3: pītisahagatehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā …
dt2.9:26.4: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā. #6
dt2.9:27.2: upekkhāsahagatehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā …
dt2.9:30.2: hetūhi ceva sahetukehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.9:30.3: hetūhi ceva hetusampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā …
dt2.9:30.4: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayuttā;
dt2.9:30.5: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.9:31.1: Sahetukehi ceva na ca hetūhi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.9:31.2: hetusampayuttehi ceva na ca hetūhi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.9:31.3: na hetusahetukehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā …
dt2.9:31.4: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.9:33.2: āsavehi ceva sāsavehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.9:33.3: āsavehi ceva āsavasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā …
dt2.9:33.4: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayuttā;
dt2.9:33.5: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.9:34.1: Āsavasampayuttehi ceva no ca āsavehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā …
dt2.9:34.2: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.

dt2.9:40.7: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā.
dt2.9:42.3: kilesehi ceva saṃkilesikehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.9:42.4: kilesehi ceva saṃkiliṭṭhehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.9:42.5: kilesehi ceva kilesasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā …
dt2.9:42.6: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayuttā;
dt2.9:42.7: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.9:43.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhehi ceva no ca kilesehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.9:43.2: kilesasampayuttehi ceva no ca kilesehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.9:43.6: pītisahagatehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā …
